tool_description: Processes delivery exceptions and delays, determining appropriate resolution actions and escalation procedures.

exception_type.description: Type of exception: delayed, damaged, lost, refused, address_invalid, weather, customs

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the affected shipment

carrier_name.description: Name of the shipping carrier reporting the exception

error_messages: Invalid exception type: Must be one of [delayed, damaged, lost, refused, address_invalid, weather, customs].
Order not found: The specified order_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid tracking number: Tracking number format is invalid for the specified carrier.
Missing exception details: exception_details cannot be empty.
Unsupported carrier: Exception handling not configured for this carrier.
usage: Provide exception_type, order_id, tracking_number, exception_details, and carrier_name to process delivery exceptions and generate resolution actions.

resolution_action.description: Recommended action to resolve the exception

escalation_required.description: Whether the exception requires human escalation

customer_notification_needed.description: Whether customer should be notified of the exception

estimated_resolution_time.description: Estimated time to resolve the exception
